title: Write a Weather Forecast Script
description: A TV meteorologist needs to write a script for their weather segment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest data from weather models (temperature, precipitation, wind).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary meteorological data.

tasks.description: Translate the complex data into simple, understandable language for a general audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: The script explains the weather in easy-to-understand terms.

tasks.description: Structure the script to align with the graphics that will be shown on screen (e.g., the 7-day forecast graphic).
tasks.expected_outcome: The script is synchronized with the visual elements of the broadcast.
